cx-javascript: Tuundina ka tuni "JavaScript" san ka bɔna, la kan ta'am tum, bii "browser" kuna ka suŋeri.
cx-specialpage-enable-betafeature: [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Content_translation|Content Translation]] de la tuunɛ ti tu kãbelɛ lerege pɛgera kɛ fum yetɔgum puan. [$1 Try it now!]
cx-error-server-connection: Tuure: kan ta'am tɔkɛ bo "server" la.
cx-desc: basɛ ti la kɔ'ɔm dɛna naana ti la [[Special:ContentTranslation|translate]] "content" pɛgera
cx-publish-page-success: Basɛ ti pɛgerɛ niɛ peelemi $1 puan
cx-publish-error-abuse-filter: Ba baŋɛ la "automatic filter" demesego daaŋɔ la n tari la daaŋɔ fu lerege la puan. "Filter" ŋmɛ: $1
cx-publish-error-empty: "Server" lebese mɛ gee ka le tara "data".
cx-publish-error-readonly: Ba ka sakɛ gulesegɔ n boi wiki puan.
cx-publish-error-spam-blacklist: Ba nyɛ sɛla ti ba wan ta'am iŋɛ n boi fu leregere la puan. Garrsegɔ: $1
cx-publish-error-title-blacklist: Tile la ti fu ŋmɛ la ba zagesɛ mɛ. N beleni fu mɛ looge yu'urɛ ayima bo fu leregere la.
cx-publish-error-unknown: Tuure mina ti ba ka le nyɛta n iŋɛ. Tuure garesegɔ: $1
cx-lost-session: fu sɔsega la daa tole ya
cx-lost-session-draft: fu sɔsega la daa tole ya. Fu demesego duma la kan ta'am biŋe see fum n ŋmɛ ki'isɛ le yɛ'ɛsa n boi "window" ayima puan.
cx-lost-session-publish: fu sɔsega la daa tole ya. Fu kan ta'am niigɛ fu leregere la peelemi see fum n mɔregɛ ŋmɛ ki'isɛ le yɛ'ɛsa n boi "window" ayima puan.
cx-lost-session-dashboard: Suŋa ti tu iŋɛ itegɔ wa, n beleni fu mɛ ŋmɛ ki'isɛ le yɛ'ɛsa.
cx-publish-summary: maalɛ mɛ gee lerege pɛgera la "$1"
cx-translation-target-page-exists: Pɛgerɛ n tari pɔsega [$1 $2] ni kɔ'ɔm bɔna la puti'irɛ "wiki" la puan.Dikɛ bisɛ ti fu bo pɛgerɛ la pɔsega yima yima.
tag-contenttranslation-description: Puti'irɛ la lerege ni ze'ele la tɔgum buyima tari ni puti'irɛ leregere lɔgerɔ tuna.
tag-contenttranslation-v2-description: Puti'irɛ la lerege ni ze'ele la tɔgum buyima puan na tari ni vuurɛ buyi n boi puti'irɛ la leregere lɔkɔ.
tag-sectiontranslation-description: Puti'irɛ la leregere ni ze'ele la bɔberɛ n boi tɔgum buyima tari ni bɔberɛ la leregere aŋa n boi puti'irɛ leregere lɔkɔ.
cx-beta-desc: Lɔkɔ n wan ta'am lerege pɛgera kalam kiŋɛ fu yetɔgum puan. Pɔsɛ leregera ze'ele [[Special:MyContributions|your contributions page]], gee demese ba zi'an la zi'an demesego yele yele bii zi'an ti ba maalɛ yetɔgum buuri buuri.
